title: @Riot KateyKhaos Update on Jayce Bug
body: As the title states, I recall you saying you were not part of the team responsible for this fix (Jayce weapon being animation locked), but would you have an update from the relevant team regarding this? I don't want to sound naggy but this bug has existed for more than a year and unlike most other bugs has a 100% occurrence and is extremely visible throughout the whole game.

replies.body:
Hey beany, 

No update on this issue. The issue is logged in the database, so it's being tracked. An issue like this isn't gameplay impacting, so it does take a backseat to more emergent issues.
Ah well thanks for the response anyways, I do hope that this will be logged in the patch notes if it does get fixed.
